Pre-Game Insights: India will play Afghanistan in their first Super 8 clash of the T20 World Cup 2024.
The match will be hosted at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados, and will be played on June 20, 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan have failed to win a single match against India in T20 cricket.
Rashid Khan & Co. have been winless in eight attempts, losing seven times (including a super over). One match was adjudged as 'No Result'.
India will be back in action after a week-long break.
Others: The group-stage clashes of the T20 World Cup 2024 are nearing a close.
India have qualified for the Super 8 stage, after topping Group A.
